main event: Two white clear shaped objects, size of a small cloud, were observed moving rapidly against a clear night sky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 12-15 minutes.,The objects appeared and disappeared at various points in the sky.,The objects were observed by radar distance.,The shape and size of the objects suggested they could be classified as n.c.c.,There was a faint noise heard during the observation that faded away.
location: Long Island City, New York, USA
